thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Broadcasting Cable To Buy Remaining Stake In Network Development Unit For 8.28 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Broadcasting Cable To Buy Remaining Stake In Network Development Unit For 8.28 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangsu broadcasting cable information network corp ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Broadcasting Cable Information Network Corp Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ACQUIRE REMAINING 70 PERCENT STAKE IN NETWORK DEVELOPMENT UNIT FOR 8.28 BILLION YUAN ($1.31 billion) VIA CASH, SHARE ISSUE Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EX7i1L Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3265 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
